original_text: And the name of the second river is Gihon: the same is it that compasseth the whole land of Ethiopia.
korean_text: 둘째 강의 이름은 기혼이라 구스 온 땅을 둘렀고

sentences.original_text: And the name of the second river is Gihon
the same is it that compasseth the whole land of Ethiopia
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 에티오피아 온 땅을 둘러싸고 있다
